name: Master Notes Database Template (for Notion)
description: Tutorial video (watch this first): https://youtu.be/HT0jiQLT98YI have an extremely simple notes management system in Notion: Create and maintain a Master Notes Database Create different views of that database for Projects, Areas, and Resources This way you'll always have instant access to the most relevant information wherever you are in your Notion database.Feel free to make a copy of my template and let me know if you like it by commenting here!Check out my full Notion course: Build Your Comma
features: Create and maintain a Master Notes Database; Create different views of that database for Projects, Areas, and Resources
